name: subadd2i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2), wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), c0))

stmt.origin: mp3an(wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2), wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc))

body.origin:
|- wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2), wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), c0))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wcel(c2, cc)
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2), wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), c0)))

-| wcel(c2, cc)

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc), wcel(c2, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), c2), wceq(co(c2, caddc, c1), c0)))

comment: Relationship between subtraction and addition. (Contributed by NM, 15-Dec-2006.)
